Dear Hagop,

In times like these, when the world feels unsteady, and the weight of it all quietly builds - itâ€™s easy to push your feelings aside, to keep going, to tell yourself itâ€™s not the right time to pause.

But your mind deserves care, especially now.

 

If youâ€™ve been feeling overwhelmed, anxious, or low - not always for one clear reason, but simply because everything feels like too much - youâ€™re not alone. Many are quietly struggling beneath the surface. And thatâ€™s exactly why weâ€™re here.

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/xnJzCR5EGUo72Drs0Fwh1xm3V?domain=e-eu.customeriomail.com>
